license.name: CMU Mach - no notices-in-documentation variant
license.notes: This is similar to CMU-Mach but omits the obligation that both notices appear in supporting documentation and omits the request to return improvements or extensions back to the copyright holder.

text.p: Permission to use, copy, modify and distribute this software and its documentation is hereby granted, provided that both the copyright notice and this permission notice appear in all copies of the software, derivative works or modified versions, and any portions thereof.
NRL ALLOWS FREE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE IN ITS "AS IS" CONDITION AND DISCLAIMS ANY LIABILITY OF ANY KIND FOR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE.
